verbose_text: In cucumber, Na+ Na 2 SiO 3.9 H 2 O treatment could increase the accumulation of soluble sugars (mainly sucrose and glucose) and decrease the osmotic potential of xylem sap in the root system compared with Na treatment, thus contributing to the promotion of root water uptake [XREF_BIBR].
